sentences.sContent: The difficulty and failure both didn't cool his ardor.
sentences.sContent_eng: The difficulty and failure both didn't cool his ardor.
sentences.sCn: 困难和失败都没有降低他的热情。

sentences.sContent: "Here's fresh meat for your axe, Kreis, " he said; "a rose-white youth with the ardor of a lover for Herbert Spencer.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Here's fresh meat for your axe, Kreis, " he said; "a rose-white youth with the ardor of a lover for Herbert Spencer.
sentences.sCn: “克瑞斯，你那板斧有了新对象了，”他说，“一个纯洁得像白玫瑰的青年，对斯宾塞怀着恋人一样的热情。

sentences.sContent: Cathy Whitaker: That was the day I stopped believing in the wild ardor of things.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cathy Whitaker: That was the day I stopped believing in the wild ardor of things.
sentences.sCn: 凯西。惠特克：那一天，让我开始不再相信狂野的热情这样的事情。
